Apos.​Input.​ActionKeyboardSet
public
Apos.​Input.​ActionKeyboardSet

Combines ActionKeyboards to make complex triggers.  Operates over keys that are needed and keys that must not be pressed.

Constructors
ActionKeyboardSet
public ActionKeyboardSet()

Empty ActionKeyboardSet.

ActionKeyboardSet
public ActionKeyboardSet(
List<ActionKeyboard> needAction,
List<ActionKeyboard> notAction
)

ActionKeyboardSet with initial values.

Parameters
needAction
List<ActionKeyboard>

A list of needed keys.

notAction
List<ActionKeyboard>

A list of keys that must never be pressed.

Public Functions
AddNeed
public ActionKeyboardSet AddNeed(
Keys key
)

This implicitly creates an ActionKeyboard.

Parameter
key
Keys

Adds a new needed key.

Returns

Returns itself for easy function chaining.

AddNeed
public ActionKeyboardSet AddNeed(
ActionKeyboard action
)
Parameter
action
ActionKeyboard

Adds an ActionKeyboard that is needed.

Returns

Returns itself for easy function chaining.

AddNot
public ActionKeyboardSet AddNot(
Keys key
)

This implicitly creates an ActionKeyboard.

Parameter
key
Keys

Adds a key that must not be pressed.

Returns

Returns itself for easy function chaining.

AddNot
public ActionKeyboardSet AddNot(
ActionKeyboard action
)
Parameter
action
ActionKeyboard

Adds an ActionKeyboard that must not be pressed.

Returns

Returns itself for easy function chaining.

Pressed
public bool Pressed()
Returns

Returns true when all the needed keys are held and at least 1 triggers as pressed.  Always returns false when at least 1 not needed key is held.

Held
public bool Held()
Returns

Returns true when all the needed keys are held.  Always returns false when at least 1 not needed key is held.

HeldOnly
public bool HeldOnly()
Returns

Returns true when all the needed keys were held and are now held.  Always returns false when at least 1 not needed key is held.

Released
public bool Released()
Returns

Returns true when at least 1 needed key is released and the other needed keys are held.  Always returns false when at least 1 not needed key is held.

Private Variables
_needAction
private List<ActionKeyboard> _needAction

List of ActionKeyboards that are needed.

_notAction
private List<ActionKeyboard> _notAction

List of ActionKeyboards that must never be held.
